WHY BCR

We use multiple liquidity providers from Tier 1 Banks and institutions to give you competitive quotes on a wide range of instruments.

  • BCR PROFILE
  • WHY BCR
  • CONTACT US
  • DISCLOSURE DOCUMENTS

Wide range of markets, deep liquidity and powerful platforms.

BCR is confident in the trading environment created by our cutting-edge technology. You will experience fast execution on all orders and impressive market liquidity. BCR clients should not be concerned with latency and slippage.

IB Program

BCR is proud to offer one of our signatures - the Leveling System. Once you choose BCR, you will be able to unlock multiple rewards and features based on your achievements.

BCR Points

BCR points, accumulated by trading with BCR, can be redeemed for popular products and accessories! Do not miss out on our offerings to our loyal clients.

CRM

BCR is constantly updating and integrating new functions in MyBCR, our client portal. You can not only monitor your account balances, trades, and transactions, but can evolve your trading strategies using our selected Indicator Gallery, featured Auto-Analyst, live trading statistics and new features that are coming soon.

Trade The Worlds’ Markets With A Trusted And Regulated Firm

IDEAL TRADING ENVIRONMENT

BCR is confident in the trading environment created by our cutting-edge technology. You will experience fast execution on all orders and impressive market liquidity. BCR clients should not be concerned with latency and slippage.

TRADE ANYTIME, ANYWHERE

By customising the industry-leading MetaTrader 4 online trading platform, our clients can easily access the financial markets anytime and anywhere through our desktop and mobile trading solutions. iPhone, iPad and Android devices are fully compatible with the MetaTrader 4 platform to offer you the ideal trading experience.

24/5 LIVE CLIENT SUPPORT

We care about our clients regardless of the size of their account. We offer the same 24/5 hour live client support to all of our clients, aiming to provide the right answers to your queries as soon as possible.

7 ASSET CLASSES WITH 80+ FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS

Our product portfolio covers Forex, Bullion, Oil, Indices, Agricultural and Foreign and Domestic Shares. You will easily find trading opportunities with our more than 80+ financial instruments to trade.

COMPREHENSIVE EDUCATIONAL TOOLS

When you become a BCR client, you will gain full access to our educational tools, including but not limited to e-books, video tutorials, market recap/outlooks and webinar/seminars.
